mapper.sql: select d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader,d.leader_id, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d
mapper.update:
update sys_dept
status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = sysdate()
where dept_id in (${ancestors})
mapper.select: select d.dept_id from sys_dept d left join sys_role_dept rd on d.dept_id = rd.dept_id where d.del_flag = '0' and rd.role_id = #{roleId} order by d.parent_id, d.order_num
